name: Pathfinder Educational Centre
bio: Pathfinder Educational Centre stands as one of Eastern India's most prestigious and trusted coaching institutes, established over three decades ago with a mission to help students excel in competitive exams. With a legacy of excellence, Pathfinder has consistently produced top rankers in JEE, NEET, WBJEE, and various Olympiads. The institute combines rigorous academic training with innovative teaching methodologies, personalized mentorship, and comprehensive test series. Pathfinder's experienced faculty, state-of-the-art infrastructure, and proven track record make it the go-to destination for serious engineering and medical aspirants in Eastern India.
teachingStyle: Concept-focused teaching with detailed notes, test series, and personalized mentorship.
achievements: 30+ years of excellence as Eastern India's top-ranked institute for JEE and NEET preparation
Produced thousands of successful alumni across IITs, NITs, and top medical colleges across India
Consistently achieving top ranks and exceptional success rates in competitive examinations
Recognized for comprehensive curriculum, expert faculty, and proven teaching methodology
